activities: We recruit new email list members for nonprofits.  In order to ensure that we do not recruit an individual who is already a member of a EU and/or Switzerland client's email list, the client sends us a list of SHA-1 encrypted email addresses of their list members.  We use that encrypted list to ensure that we do not recruit any of those individuals for the client.  We do not receive any other personal information.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Clients provide lists of SHA-1 encrypted email addresses.  No data is manually processed.
